info.title: EasyBroker API
info.description: API for accessing and working with EasyBroker accounts. To get started click the Authorize button below and enter your API key.

externalDocs.description: View the getting started guide in Spanish

get.description: Returns a list of the contact requests in a given period or for a specific property, if no parameters are provided all the contact requests will be returned

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Content's page

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Max results per page (Maximum: 50)

parameters.name: happened_after
parameters.description: Contact requests created after the given date

parameters.name: happened_before
parameters.description: Contact requests created before the given date

parameters.name: property_id
parameters.description: The ID of a property to retrieve the contact requests for

message.example: I'm interested in this property. Please contact me.

401.description: API key is missing or invalid

post.description: Creates or updates a new lead in EasyBroker that is interested in the provided property.

name.description: Required if the request does not provide a property_id

phone.description: Required if the request does not provide neither a property id nor an email

email.description: Required if the request does not provide neither a property id nor a phone number

property_id.description: If the request provides this parameter, it should also provide a name, email or phone number

message.example: I'm interested in this property. Please contact me.
message.description: Required if the request does not provide a property_id

401.description: API key is missing or invalid

404.description: No property exists for the given property ID

error.example: The specified property could not be found.

422.description: The request couldn't be created because it is invalid

error.example: You must specify a name, email or phone number.

get.description: Returns a list of properties from your organization.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Content's page

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Max results per page (Maximum: 50)

unit.description: Some properties, like warehouses, are sold and rented per square meter. Some terrains are rented per hectare.

type.description: Months type only applies for rental operation.

400.description: At least one param has an invalid format

error.example: The properties statuses format is invalid

401.description: API key is missing or invalid

post.description: Creates a new property in your EasyBroker account. This endpoint is still in beta, please contact our support team if you have any problem or want to share any feedback.

property_type.description: The property type. It should match one of the property types available for your account.

description.example: This property is very well-lit in a lovely neighborhood overlooking a park.

private_description.example: Selling this property is our top priority and we are willing to offer a discount.
private_description.description: A private description visible only to your team.

active.description: Indicates whether this operation is active or not.
Indicates whether this operation is active or not.

agent.description: The EasyBroker account email of the agent assigned to the property.

show_prices.description: An option that allows you to show or hide the EB listing prices.

age.description: One of "under_construction", "new_construction" or the year the property was built.

floor.description: The floor number in which the property is located, useful for apartments. It can be set to a custom value such as 'Penthouse'

floors.description: The number of floors in the building.

expenses.description: The monthly expenses of the property.

internal_id.description: A unique id used in your organization. It can only contain letters, numbers and a small set of special characters (- _ , . &  /)

name.description: A location string containing the neighborhood, city and the administrative division where the property is located. It must match a location found through the locations endpoint.

street.description: The name of the street where the property is located.

latitude.description: The latitude where the property is located.

longitude.description: The longitude where the property is located.

features.description: An array of strings, they can be in either English, Spanish or Portuguese but must match one of the available when creating properties through EasyBroker's UI.

share_commission.description: An option to specify whether your agency is willing to share the commission with other agencies in the EasyBroker agency network.

collaboration_notes.example: We only share commission with agencies located in the same city.
collaboration_notes.description: Notes on conditions or details for collaborations.

show_exact_location.description: Set it to 'true' to show the exact address location and map location or 'false' to hide it.

covered_space.description: In square meters. Not Available in Mexico.

description.example: This property is very well-lit in a lovely neighborhood overlooking a park.

covered_space.description: In square meters. Not Available in Mexico.

age.description: One of "under_construction", "new" or the year the building was built

unit.description: Some properties, like warehouses, are sold and rented per square meter. Some terrains are rented per hectare.

type.description: Months type only applies for rental operation.

401.description: API key is missing or invalid

422.description: The property couldn't be created because it is invalid

parameters.name: property_id
parameters.description: The public or internal ID of the specified property

covered_space.description: In square meters. Not Available in Mexico.

age.description: One of "under_construction", "new" or the year the building was built

type.description: Months type only applies for rental operation.

404.description: No property was found with the provided ID

get.summary: List all MLS properties (Requires MLS API Plan)
get.description: Returns a list of published properties with shared commissions from your collaborators, groups and your organization. This endpoint is only available for MLS API plan subscribers.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Content's page

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Max results per page (Maximum: 50)

unit.description: Some properties, like warehouses, are sold and rented per square meter. Some terrains are rented per hectare.

401.description: API key is missing or invalid

403.description: The MLS API plan is required for this endpoint

error.example: You need an MLS API plan to access this endpoint

parameters.name: property_id
parameters.description: The public ID of the specified property

get.summary: Retrieve a MLS property (Requires MLS API Plan)
get.description: Returns the detailed information of a property with shared commissions from your collaborators, groups and your organization. This endpoint is only available for MLS API plan subscribers.

description.example: This property is very well-lit in a lovely neighborhood overlooking a park.

covered_space.description: In square meters. Not Available in Mexico.

age.description: One of "under_construction", "new" or the year the building was built

unit.description: Some properties, like warehouses, are sold and rented per square meter. Some terrains are rented per hectare.

401.description: API key is missing or invalid

403.description: The MLS API plan is required for this endpoint

error.example: You need an MLS API plan to access this endpoint

404.description: No property was found with the provided ID

get.description: Retrieve a location name and the childs of a given location <neighborhood, city, state>.  If no parameter provided, the states from the country registered in your account will be returned.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Location to find

401.description: API key is missing or invalid

404.description: No location was found with the provided query

get.description:
Returns a list of property listing statuses from your organization.
                         If you have an MLS API plan, you can also get your collaborators' listing statuses for all their published properties and the properties unpublished in the last month.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Content's page

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Max results per page (Maximum: 100)

updated_after.description: Retrieve listing statuses for properties updated after the given time.

updated_before.description: Retrieve listing statuses for properties updated before the given time.

parameters.name: search[include_collaborator_listings]
parameters.description: Set this parameter to true if you have an MLS API Plan and you want to include your collaborators' listing statuses. All published properties will be included but only properties unpublished in the last month will be shown.

parameters.name: search[agency_id]
parameters.description: Only works if you have an MLS API plan and include_collaborator_listings is set to true. This parameter allows you to filter listings from one specific agency.

updated_at.description: The last time the property was updated.

400.description: At least one search param has an invalid format.

401.description: API key is missing or invalid

get.description: Returns a list of contacts from your organization.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Content's page

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Max results per page (Maximum: 50)

updated_after.description: Retrieve contacts updated after the given time.

updated_before.description: Retrieve contacts updated before the given time.

parameters.name: search[statuses][]
parameters.description:
This parameter allows you to filter contacts with the selected statuses.

| Allowed status | Description |
|-----|-----|
| `stage_new` | Needs to be contacted  | 
| `contacted` | Contacted but not yet qualified  | 
| `open` | Qualified and currently in process  | 
| `for_future` | Qualified but won't move forward for several months  | 
| `won` | Successfully completed transaction  | 
| `abandoned` | Not a qualified lead or not worth the effort  |

parameters.name: search[probabilities][]
parameters.description: This parameter allows you to filter contacts with the selected probabilities

parameters.name: search[tag]
parameters.description: This parameter allows you to filter listings from one specific tag.

parameters.name: search[email]
parameters.description: This parameter allows you to filter contacts based on the assigned agent's email.

parameters.name: search[offices][]
parameters.description: This parameter allows you to filter contacts by office names.

parameters.name: search[sources][]
parameters.description: Retrieve contact listing from multiple sources.

400.description: At least one search param has an invalid format

401.description: API key is missing or invalid

parameters.name: contact_id
parameters.description: The ID of the specified contact

get.description: Returns the detailed information of a contact from your EasyBroker account.

401.description: API key is missing or invalid

404.description: No contact was found with the provided ID

get.description: Returns a list of collaborations from your organization.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Content's page

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Max results per page (Maximum: 50)

group.description: Indicates whether this collaborator is a group or association.

listing_statuses_search_collaborator_lis.name: search[include_collaborator_listings]
listing_statuses_search_collaborator_lis.description: Set this parameter to true if you have an MLS API Plan and you want to include your collaborators' listing statuses. All published properties will be included but only properties unpublished in the last month will be shown.

listing_statuses_search_agency_id.name: search[agency_id]
listing_statuses_search_agency_id.description: Only works if you have an MLS API plan and include_collaborator_listings is set to true. This parameter allows you to filter listings from one specific agency.

contacts_search_tag.name: search[tag]
contacts_search_tag.description: This parameter allows you to filter listings from one specific tag.

contacts_search_agent.name: search[email]
contacts_search_agent.description: This parameter allows you to filter contacts based on the assigned agent's email.

contacts_search_statuses.name: search[statuses][]
contacts_search_statuses.description:
This parameter allows you to filter contacts with the selected statuses.

| Allowed status | Description |
|-----|-----|
| `stage_new` | Needs to be contacted  | 
| `contacted` | Contacted but not yet qualified  | 
| `open` | Qualified and currently in process  | 
| `for_future` | Qualified but won't move forward for several months  | 
| `won` | Successfully completed transaction  | 
| `abandoned` | Not a qualified lead or not worth the effort  |

contacts_search_probability.name: search[probabilities][]
contacts_search_probability.description: This parameter allows you to filter contacts with the selected probabilities

contacts_search_offices.name: search[offices][]
contacts_search_offices.description: This parameter allows you to filter contacts by office names.

contacts_search_sources.name: search[sources][]
contacts_search_sources.description: Retrieve contact listing from multiple sources.

ApiKeyAuth.name: X-Authorization
ApiKeyAuth.description: You can find your API key in the general settings section of your EasyBroker account. It's only accessible for account administrators.
